headline: ILLINOIS INSTRUMENTS TRACE OXYGEN ANALYZER
description: Trace Oxygen Analyzer     The Illinois Instruments EC900 range of process oxygen analyzers are accurate, reliable and flexible  under the most demanding on-line operating conditions. It uses a variety of specially engineered  electrochemical fuel cells to monitor oxygen within most industrial gases and atmospheres.   Features:  • Long life, maintenance-free, disposable oxygen sensors.  • Ambient air or traceable gas calibration.  • Microprocessor controlled functions.  • Large, auto-ranging LED display.  • Fast response.  • Unaffected by vibration or position.  • Specific to oxygen
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
